channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Cheadle to design a safe garden for pastor and PhD student Joy to relax, read, entertain, study and pray in.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan is in Chester to meet retirees Richard and Ann, who have been married for 34 years.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: Superfans bid for Nike trainers and Oasis lyrics hand-written by Noel. A prized work by sculptor Anish Kapoor and vintage luggage with a history also go under the hammer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey meets the members of the Sandringham Women's Institute who knew the Queen personally and learns how to become a horse whisperer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: Leeds football programme from 1904, a taxidermy unicorn and a set of drums from the 1970s.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Scotland's Greatest Escape
channel.desc: A retreat with a military past, a 500-year-old castle and a former train station hotel are the contenders.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. Alex and Peter go down a copper mine, just a few hundred yards from their cottage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Cheadle to design a safe garden for pastor and PhD student Joy to relax, read, entertain, study and pray in.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan is in Chester to meet retirees Richard and Ann, who have been married for 34 years.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Stick Up
channel.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cool It Carol!
channel.desc: A young couple journey to Swinging London in search of fame and fortune. But with work scarce, they get drawn into the seedy world of modelling and sex work. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Swinging London Session Musicians
channel.desc: A history of London's Session Musicians, sharing their memories and experiences from the 50s and 60s onwards across the musical spectrum, from rock and pop to reggae and classical.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Flo are in Sheffield to create a garden with a forest feel for couple Karen and Kathryn, lovers of the outdoors.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Stick Up
channel.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: How much will the collectors and dealers bid for a Banksy artwork, pickled pig foetuses and Tommy Cooper's fez.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A 1940s fairground attraction, Saddam Hussein's fork and a pinball machine signed by Elton John come to the auction house.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: An Egyptian amulet, a silver pin cushion and a collection of timepieces make the auction tick. And will someone be sitting pretty on some Louis XVI gilt chairs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Detonator II - Night Watch
channel.desc: Action. Pierce Brosnan plays a UN espionage expert who leads an elite team to recover a stolen Rembrandt masterpiece in this action sequel based on Alistair MacLean's novel.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Sex Thief
channel.desc: Riotous early 70s comedy in which an audacious cat burglar steals more than his female victims' jewellery. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey begins her royal road trip at the Highland Games in Balmoral, before sampling royal whisky and attempting a dance at the Ghillies Ball.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey visits Richmond Park's hunting lodge, goes racing at Ascot and is shown around some of the Queen's favourite West End haunts.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Lee are in Hemel Hempstead to design a practical, usable family space for Lisa, Chris and their children. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: An Egyptian amulet, a silver pin cushion and a collection of timepieces make the auction tick. And will someone be sitting pretty on some Louis XVI gilt chairs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Going To The Dogs
channel.desc: The story of Wimbledon Greyhound Stadium which drew crowds of 25,000 in its heyday. After it closed in 2017 just two of London's once-27 greyhound race tracks remain operating.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Skyfire
channel.desc: Action. Tianhuo Island is paradise in the Pacific. Such a shame it's located in the Ring of Fire, a world-famous volcanic belt. Guess what happens. Jason Isaacs stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Assassination Bureau
channel.desc: Action. Would-be journalist Sonya Winter investigates the Assassination Bureau, a mysterious organization. Ollie Reed and Diana Rigg star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Heartbreakers
channel.desc: Comedy. A brilliant mother and daughter con team have their grift down to a fine art. Starring Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Gene Hackman and Ray Liotta.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Permissive
channel.desc: Bad girls don't come to London, they're made in London. Suzy, a young country girl, is led astray by the wild members of a rock group. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: School for Sex
channel.desc: Carry On-style comedy curio. A divorced man teaches girls how to swindle rich men - and in return he gets a cut of their takings. Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
channel.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tailored Stories
channel.desc: An oral history of Savile Row in London's Mayfair which has been the home of quality bespoke tailoring for over 200 years.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Chorlton to design a garden for Louise and Steve, inspired by their New Orleans wedding.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the team help a 15-year-old boy confined to his wheelchair who has become increasingly confined to his house and cannot access the garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: Leeds football programme from 1904, a taxidermy unicorn and a set of drums from the 1970s.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: 1/5, The estate gets ready for Easter, as castle manager John organises an egg hunt and head of visitor reception Paul prepares the vintage Rolls-Royce. Will the first event of the season go to plan.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A guitar amp used by Jimi Hendrix, a bizarre collection of celebrity hair, a stunning vintage travel trunk, and a chair with ornate pagan carvings all go under the hammer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Scotland's Greatest Escape
channel.desc: A trip to remote Doune Knoydart, bothies in Dumfries and Galloway, and an eco-log cabin village set in an 8,000-acre estate in the heart of the Highlands.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is February and archaeologists Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn and historian Ruth Goodman approach the halfway point in their year on the Edwardian Farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV:
channel.desc: Comedy sketch show in BSL with a variety of characters, including a fitness fanatic, a police officer and a football manager.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Tom Gaisford's film follows a gay trans man stepping into the ring for a boxing fight. This knockout documentary gives you a ringside seat to a situation gaining notoriety.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the team help a 15-year-old boy confined to his wheelchair who has become increasingly confined to his house and cannot access the garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: 1/5, The estate gets ready for Easter, as castle manager John organises an egg hunt and head of visitor reception Paul prepares the vintage Rolls-Royce. Will the first event of the season go to plan.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV:
channel.desc: Comedy sketch show in BSL with a variety of characters, including a fitness fanatic, a police officer and a football manager.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bread
channel.desc: Seventies drama. Returning home from the Isle of Wight Pop Festival, a free-spirited group of guys and girls clash with the landowner where they pitch camp. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Got It Made
channel.desc: Norfolk-set coming-of-age drama. Mere days before her wedding, an aristocratic girl discovers some hideous truths about the people closest to her. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hold Out A Hand
channel.desc: Hold out a Hand is a powerful short film talking about mental health and suicide within Gypsy and Travellers communities from real lived experience and in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Blood On Satan's Claw
channel.desc: In 18th-century England, a farmer finds a deformed skull, sparking a sinister influence over the village's youth, who fall under the grip of a demonic force. Folk horror classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: D Day - Hour by Hour
channel.desc: On the 80th anniversary of D-Day, a turning point of World War II, extraordinary archive materials reveal contrasting stories from the Allied Normandy beach landings of 6 June 1944.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Corby to design a global garden with a nod to both Sid's Asian heritage and Dan's northern European background.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan meets Anne and Mike who has dementia. The layout of the house and garden means Mike is finding it difficult to cope and risks never leaving his home.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A guitar amp used by Jimi Hendrix, a bizarre collection of celebrity hair, a stunning vintage travel trunk, and a chair with ornate pagan carvings all go under the hammer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The castle marks the release of the second Downton Abbey film with an interview on the Lorraine breakfast show and a trip to London's Leicester Square for the premiere.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A piece of Ayrton Senna's race car and a poster from a Sex Pistols tour that never happened are some of the rarities up for grabs this time. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Scotland's Greatest Escape
channel.desc: Three Scottish escapes are judged as part of wildcard week, but only one can make it through to the grand final.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is March, and Ruth Goodman, Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn greet the long-awaited arrival of spring. It is time to bring in the daffodil harvest.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Corby to design a global garden with a nod to both Sid's Asian heritage and Dan's northern European background.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan meets Anne and Mike who has dementia. The layout of the house and garden means Mike is finding it difficult to cope and risks never leaving his home.

channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The castle marks the release of the second Downton Abbey film with an interview on the Lorraine breakfast show and a trip to London's Leicester Square for the premiere.[(96057)]
